Label: plant phenological stage
Text definition: A {spatiotemporal region} that encompasses some part of the life of a plant part, a {whole plant}, or a population of whole plants and is part of a {plant growth cycle}.

Label: whole plant phenological stage
Text definition: A {plant phenological stage} that has as participant exactly one {whole plant}.
Formal definition: 'plant phenological stage' THAT 'has participant' EXACTLY 1 'whole plant'

Label: whole plant initial growth phenological stage
Text definition: A {whole plant phenological stage} in which the participant plant is in a {plant growth cycle} and has at least one {vegetative shoot system} that has not yet produced a {true leaf}.

Label: whole plant initial growth stage during first growth cycle
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth phenological stage} in which the participant plant is in its {initial growth cycle}.

Label: whole plant emergence stage during first growth cycle
Parent class: 'whole plant initial growth stage during first growth cycle' (PPO:0000005)
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth stage during first growth cycle} in which the participant plant is visible above the ground and the plant has not yet produced a {true leaf}.

Label: whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth phenological stage} in which the participant plant is in a {later growth cycle}.
Plant type: all vascular plants with later growth cycles

Label: whole plant emergence stage during later growth cycle
Parent class: 'whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle} in which the participant plant is an herbaceous perennial plant, the plant is visible above the ground, and the plant has not yet produced a {true leaf} in its current growth cycle.

Label: whole plant new green shoots sprouting from nodes on existing stems stage
Parent class: 'whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle} in which the participant plant has new growth visible on an existing above-ground {shoot system}.

Label: whole plant regreening of existing stems or vascular leaves stage
Parent class: 'whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle} in which the participant plant is regreening.

Label: whole plant bud burst phenological stage
Parent class: 'whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle' (PPO:0000019)
Text definition: A {whole plant initial growth stage during later growth cycle} in which the participant plant is a woody plant that has at least one {vegetative bud} in the {bud burst stage}.
Traits: % buds bursting, no. of buds bursting

Label: whole plant vascular leaf phenological stage
Text definition: A {whole plant phenological stage} in which the participant plant has at least one {true leaf}.

Label: whole plant leaf expansion stage
Text definition: A {whole plant vascular leaf phenological stage}  in which the participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf expansion stage}.
Traits: no. leaves in expansion stage, % leaves in expansion stage

Label: whole plant mature leaf stage
Text definition: A {whole plant vascular leaf phenological stage} in which the participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf post-expansion stage}.
Traits: no. of mature leaves, % mature leaves

Label: whole plant senescent leaf stage
Text definition: A {whole plant vascular leaf phenological stage}  in which the participant plant has at least one {vascular leaf} in the {vascular leaf senescent stage}.
Plant type: all annual vascular plants and vascular plants with later growth cycles
Traits: no. of senesced leaves, % senesced leaves

Label: whole plant falling leaf stage
Text definition: A {whole plant vascular leaf phenological stage}  in which the participant plant has abscised at least one {vascular leaf} (i.e., when at least one leaf has undergone {leaf abscission}) but has not yet abscised all its leaves.
Traits: no. of abscised leaves, % abscised leaves
